title: The Book Club: Andrea Elliott
description: In this week's Book Club podcast I'm joined by the New York Times's Andrea Elliott, who won the Pulitzer Prize for her book Invisible Child: Poverty, Survival and Hope in New York City. She tells me how she came to spend seven years reporting on a single, homeless family in Brooklyn, how she negotiated her duty to observe rather than participate â€“ and what their telenovela-like experiences tell us about American history.
itunes:author: The Spectator
